import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import {useNavigate, useParams} from'react-router-dom'; import './Style.css'; const Update = () => { const [Ename, setEname] = useState('') const [Eid, setEid] = useState('') const [Edept, setEdept] = useState('') const [Edob, setEdob] = useState('') const [Egender, setEgender] = useState('') const [Edesign, setEdesign] = useState('') const [Esalary, setEsalary] = useState('') const [Eaddress, setEaddress] = useState('') const [Elocation, setElocation] = useState('') const [Epincode, setEpincode] = useState('') const [Eexperience, setEexperience] = useState('') const [Eage, setEage] = useState('') const navigate=useNavigate(); const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios }) const handleUpadte = (event) =>{ // alert('Form Submitted Successfully'); } return (

Update Employee Details

Employee_Name:
setEname(e.target.value)} values={Ename} required/>

setEid(e.target.value)} values={Eid} required/>

setEgender(e.target.value)} values={Egender} /> setEgender(e.target.value)} values={Egender} />

setEdesign(e.target.value)} values={Edesign} required/>
Employee_Salary:
setEsalary(e.target.value)} values={Esalary} required/>
Employee_Address:
setEaddress(e.target.value)} values={Eaddress} required/>
Employee_Location:
setElocation(e.target.value)} values={Elocation} required/>
Employee_Pincode:
setEpincode(e.target.value)} values={Epincode} required/>
Employee_Experience:
setEexperience(e.target.value)} values={Eexperience} required/>
Employee_Age:
setEage(e.target.value)} values={Eage} required/>
) } export default Update
